title: Zalesie, Biała Podlaska County
data: Zalesie [zaˈlɛɕɛ] is a village in Biała Podlaska County, Lublin Voivodeship, in eastern Poland.[1] It is the seat of the gmina (administrative district) called Gmina Zalesie. It lies approximately 18 kilometres (11 mi) east of Biała Podlaska and 104 km (65 mi) north-east of the regional capital Lublin. This Biała Podlaska County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
